sessions.title: Multi-Region Active-Active Architectures
sessions.description: Design globally resilient applications with active-active multi-region architectures. Learn data replication strategies, traffic routing patterns, and disaster recovery best practices.

sessions.title: Zero Trust Security on AWS
sessions.description: Implement zero trust security models using AWS services. Explore identity verification, least privilege access, micro-segmentation, and continuous security monitoring strategies.
speakers: David Kim, Sr. Security Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: VPC Design Patterns for Scalable Architectures
sessions.description: Master VPC networking fundamentals and advanced design patterns. Learn subnet sizing, routing tables, NAT gateway strategies, and multi-account VPC architectures.

sessions.title: Financial Services Cloud Compliance: PCI DSS and SOC 2
sessions.description: Navigate financial services regulatory requirements on AWS. Learn PCI DSS compliance strategies, SOC 2 controls, audit logging, and evidence collection for regulated workloads.
speakers: Victoria Chen, FSI Compliance Lead, AWS
Mark Williams, Sr. Security Consultant, AWS

sessions.title: AWS IAM: Advanced Access Control Patterns
sessions.description: Master AWS Identity and Access Management with advanced patterns. Explore permission boundaries, service control policies, cross-account access, and least privilege design.

sessions.title: AWS Transit Gateway: Simplified Network Management
sessions.description: Centralize network connectivity with AWS Transit Gateway. Learn hub-and-spoke architectures, route table design, and integration with AWS Direct Connect and VPN.
speakers: James Chen, Network Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Disaster Recovery Strategies on AWS
sessions.description: Design comprehensive disaster recovery solutions on AWS. Compare backup/restore, pilot light, warm standby, and multi-site active/active DR strategies.

sessions.title: AWS GuardDuty and Security Hub: Threat Detection at Scale
sessions.description: Build comprehensive threat detection using AWS GuardDuty and Security Hub. Explore anomaly detection, automated remediation, and security findings aggregation across accounts.

sessions.title: AWS PrivateLink: Secure Private Connectivity
sessions.description: Implement private connectivity between VPCs and AWS services using AWS PrivateLink. Learn endpoint configuration, security best practices, and cross-account service access.

sessions.title: Well-Architected Framework: Best Practices
sessions.description: Apply the AWS Well-Architected Framework to your applications. Review operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, cost optimization, and sustainability pillars.
speakers: Lisa Martinez, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Real-Time Fraud Detection with AWS Machine Learning
sessions.description: Build real-time fraud detection systems using Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Fraud Detector. Explore feature engineering, model training, and low-latency inference for financial transactions.
speakers: Dr. Anita Patel, ML Specialist, AWS
Jason Wu, FSI Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS KMS and Secrets Manager: Encryption Key Management
sessions.description: Implement comprehensive encryption strategies with AWS Key Management Service and Secrets Manager. Learn key rotation, envelope encryption, and secure secrets management.

sessions.title: Event-Driven Architectures with Amazon EventBridge
sessions.description: Design scalable event-driven architectures using Amazon EventBridge. Explore event routing patterns, schema registries, cross-account event delivery, and integration with SaaS providers.
speakers: Carlos Mendez, Sr. Solutions Architect, AWS
